detectors.description:
MasterDeposit.transferTokens(address[],address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c2/c2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299_MasterDeposit.sol#385-402) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- erc20Balance == 0 (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c2/c2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299_MasterDeposit.sol#391)

Claimable.transferOwnership(address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c2/c2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299_MasterDeposit.sol#248-250) should emit an event for: 
	- pendingOwner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c2/c2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299_MasterDeposit.sol#249)

Claimable.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c2/c2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299_MasterDeposit.sol#248) lacks a zero-check on :
		- pendingOwner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c2/c2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299_MasterDeposit.sol#249)

MasterDeposit.transferTokens(address[],address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c2/c2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299_MasterDeposit.sol#385-402) has external calls inside a loop: ChildDeposit(deposit).withdraw(_tokenContractAddress,coldWallet2Share,coldWallet2) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c2/c2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299_MasterDeposit.sol#400)
